title: Staff UI Developer
description:
Have you got experience using React and Typescript to lead design implementation?

Are you looking for the opportunity to work with an industry-leading scaleup?


ü§ñ Staff UI Developer ‚Äì AI Data Analysis ü§ñ
üí∞ Salary ‚Äì up to ¬£100k + bonus + shares
üìç Location ‚Äì fully remote in UK (couple of visits to office a year)


We are super excited to be working with our industry-leading partner who use their expert knowledge of the financial market, software engineering, data science and behavioural change to help asset and portfolio managers improve the decision-making measures in order to yield greater investment results.

Their clients include trillion-dollar asset management firms, where their two key products have resulted in an average performance improvement of over 200 bps.

As a Staff UI Developer, your responsibilities will include:

Lead frontend architecture and development of scalable, high-performance UI components for financial analytics platforms, ensuring seamless data visualisation and interaction
Optimise user experience by collaborating with designers and engineers to create intuitive, responsive, and accessible interfaces
Develop and optimise seamless data visualisation and interaction
Provide technical leadership, mentor junior developers, and drive technical excellence by contributing to a culture of knowledge sharing and continuous improvement

You will have experience with the following tech stack: React, Typescript, AWS, SQL, Node.js or Next.js.

You will receive an abundance of great benefits as a Staff UI Developer:

Bonus
Share options
Private healthcare
Free gym membership
Ability to working from home 5 days a week if desired

If you have experience working in a fast-paced scaleup and are ready to use your strong React skills in a new challenge, apply now for this excellent Staff UI Developer opportunity!

Please note: Due to compliancy reasons, we will only be able to consider applications based in the UK.
